sub_title: Digital Marketing & E-commerce Danone/Nutricia World Wide
summary:
Highly driven and passionate about digital marketing (OMNI-channel) and ecommerce, with an agile mindset and a passion for digital transformation and change management. Proven ability to turn around teams to a highly profitable group of people through strong leadership, people-management skills, lean/agile approach and a good strategic planning, where happiness and learning is also an important factor. Strong analytic skills and much experience with customer driven programs for online retail/pure players and digital transformations within retail and corporates. Experience with running transformations from local to central, setting up an inhouse media/digital structure within a corporate and provide a strong growth ominichannel strategy. Also expersience with setiing up an inhouse design team, plus working with creative agencies.

More than 15 years of work experience in fulltime jobs (start-ups and corporates) in all aspects of digital marketing (e-commerce, UX/CX, all internet marketing channels, social media, email marketing, PR & Brand, Performance marketing, media and insides, loyalty & inventive partnership programs, consumer care & engagement, Etrade, reviews, marketplaces). Also experience with working in international teams and projects, remoted working and living in foreign countries. Currently part of the European Management Team of Philips.

Volunteering: Expert of the expert group Customer Loyalty & Retention and the expert group Orientation for Shopping 2020. Shopping 2020 is a research program with the purpose to develop a future vision about the (online) purchase from products and services in a broad societal perspective. Contributed to the book: Shopping Tomorrow, are you ready for the consumer of 2020?

I graduated in August 2015 for my Executive International MBA at Hult Business School with distinction. I studied in London, Dubai, Shanghai, New York, San Francisco and Boston. Other recent studies: Certificate International Leadership and Organizational Behaviour, Harvard Business Manager Courses, Squared Online Course, diverse electives at Hult Business School (Women's Leadership & Gender Intelligence, Data Science, Consumer behavior & cross cultural marketing), Agile Marketing and Lean Courses. In 2020 I received my Coaching Certificate. I am joining a life long learning program at Hult Business School for executives.

Communication Science at the Faculty of Behavioural Science

awards.title: Finalist Philips Excellence Competition 2019
awards.description: This competition shows what Philips stands for externally: delivering quality and adding value for customers every day. Several thousand employees take part in the PEC every year. Together with my team I implemented a digital change within Personal Health by combining agile with lean, giving young digital talent more space and fully implementing the customer first approach. With this case we reached the world final.

authors.headline: Digital Marketing & E-commerce Danone/Nutricia World Wide

profile_positions.description: Transforming and shaping Ecommerce and Digital Marketing for Nutricia World Wide (48 countries) within Danone. Leading a multi-cultural and multi-functional team excelling in Ecommerce, Consumer Engagement and Health Care Professional Marketing within the FMCG business (Specialised Nutrition).
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing & Ecommerce

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the ecommerce business for Personal Health in Europe:  Business to Consumer, Marketplaces, Pricing, Loyalty & Incentive Business (B2B), Activation, Merchandising and Merchandise Planning. Member of the European MT Personal Health and the global Digital Marketing & Ecommerce MT.  Implemented 4 big transformation projects in one year. This resulted in the fact that the D2C business became the second largest channel in Western Europe with a strong double-digit growth and a step-up in profitability.

-Responsible for P&L of the Consumer Store EU
-Defining strategy & activations for Consumer Store EU from an omnichannel approach
-Grow the sales and digital performance of the personal health categories by
implementing the merchandising strategy in close collaboration with stakeholders
-Analyzing portfolio data and making proposals for improvement of the consumer decision journey, conversion and basket value. 
-Identify, suggest and enroll promotional activities to drive sales opportunities whilst mitigating risk to margin
-Ensuring accuracy for all aspects of the products, including set up, pricing, categorisation, ranking, upsell / cross sell online, listing new products and Optimise web conversion, through product availability
-Enlarge Partnerships and Marketplace Business Philips Europe
profile_positions.title: D2C Commercial Leader Europe Personal Health

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for Digital Marketing & Ecommerce for the Personal Health Business in the Benelux Market. Member of the Management Team. Leading a team (+30 people) with the next squads: consumer store Benelux (incl loyalty and incentive partnerships), Etrade, performance marketing, PR, Media & Brand, Consumer Care & Engagement.


Implemented an inhouse media and creative structure and agile way of working for collaborating cross-functional with Trade Shop Marketing, Marketing Categories/Clusters, Finance and Sales. Results seen in revenue, improved ROI, qualtative kpi's and team happiness. Main contact for agency's (media offline and online, assets) and implementing and agile wow via online tooling with them to come to an omnichannel strategy.
profile_positions.title: Director Digital Marketing & Ecommerce Personal Health Benelux

profile_positions.description:
As Digital Lead I am responsible to ensure Philips is the best-in-class brand in digital programs and capabilities in the Personal Health domain for the Benelux Commercial Organization. Member of the Benelux Management Team.

-Develop the digital marketing strategy, managing the user experience throughout the consumer decision journey, and the e-commerce strategy with our retail partners and for the Philips.nl and Philips.be Webshop (Omnichannel)
-Primary consultant for all digital related challenges for local teams in the Benelux (marketing, trade shopper marketing, sales, Consumer Care and IT) and global teams (Business groups, Central Digital Team, Digital services and IT)
-Drive online change management in the commercial organization across different areas of expertise
-Coordinate all online activities to ensure maximum effectiveness and business results (E-Trade Marketing, Above the Line media, Retail media, CRM, Content creation and Social Media)
-Responsible for the P&L of our Philips.nl/be  Webshop and all digital activities
-Drive online excellence in local marketing activation plans with the Consumer Marketing Managers of the 10 different product categories
-People management of a dynamic team (12 members) with the responsibility of:
*Philips website, Shop and White labels
*Search program: SEA and SEO
*Online consumer engagement and CRM
*Ratings and Reviews programs
* Performance Team (Analytics, Insights & Digital infrastructure) 
- Develop the Digital Education Plan Personal Health Organization
-Stakeholdermanagement different digital agencies
profile_positions.title: Digital Lead Personal Health Benelux

- Key role between the team and the different stakeholders within the company

- ROI driven goals

member, responsible for internet marketing part

profile_positions.title: Team lead CRM

profile_positions.description:
GHBS is a hockeyclub in Groningen with more than 1200 members.
Besides my current job I also have a paid position at the hockey club GHBS as youth manager. I
manage a team of 3 coordinators en 3 committees who are responsible for the daily activities at the
hockey club which has 600 youth members. In this team I am responsible for the performance of these people. I also make the annual plan and I am responsible for the budgets. I take care of the
communication between the various committees, the coordinators and the (youth) board. Also I am the contact for the Dutch hockey union.
profile_positions.title: Manager Information & Communication Youth Hockey

volunteer_experiences.role: Expert of the expert group Customer Loyalty & Retention
volunteer_experiences.description:
The purpose of this research is to develop a roadmap which you could use to become a customer orientated company whith customers who stay loyal to you.  

Contributed to the book: Shopping Tomorrw, are you ready for the consumer of 2020?

volunteer_experiences.role: Expert of the expert group Orientation
volunteer_experiences.description:
The research program Shopping 2020 has been started in June 2013 by 16 trade associations. The purpose of this research program is to develop a future vision about the (online) purchase from products and services in a broad societal perspective.
The expertgroup Orientation did the following research: How do consumers and companies communicate during the orientation phase of the Customer Buying Journey? Our group mission is to envision the digital marketing space in 2020. ombining knowledge and skills across advertising, media, marketing sectors as well as brands and re/etailers we discuss the implications and share our recommendations for digital marketing organisations today.

For more information see: www.shopping2020.nl
